profile.description:
I have over 14 years of experience in web development and work as a solutions architect, leading end-to-end projects across Backend, Frontend, and Infrastructure. Currently, as a co-founder of Coodesh, I drive the technical and behavioral assessment of software professionals, helping build high-performing teams and contributing to the sustainable success of innovative initiatives.

My career is defined by a strategic, multidisciplinary perspective that combines deep technical expertise, creativity, and leadership.

I’m recognized for turning complex challenges into growth opportunities, applying solutions that optimize processes and promote excellence in digital projects. Whether building robust backend systems, creating intuitive frontend interfaces, or implementing scalable infrastructure architectures, my work delivers positive impact across the full development and innovation lifecycle.

challenges.description: A Coodesh é uma plataforma que ajuda empresas a avaliar e contratar os melhores desenvolvedores para o seus times.
Nessa posição, trabalhei lado a lado com o CEO desenvolvendo novas tecnologias para os sites e gerenciando toda a equipe de TI
Fundamos e desenvolvemos o Tomorrow Science, um site de ciência popular em Taiwan e Hong Kong, com mais de 140.000 seguidores nas redes sociais e mais de 300.000 páginas vistas mensalmente.

Na Novaclass trabalhamos com um ambiente interativo de gerenciamento do plano de ensino, fornecendo estratégias de recursos empresariais e indicação de conteúdo multimídia a serem utilizados por diretores, professores e estudantes em instituições educacionais.  O mercado-alvo é as escolas que desejam aumentar os níveis de satisfação de seus alunos porque existem vários professores com falta de tempo para preparar lições interativas. Isso resulta na insatisfação dos estudantes porque os professores não usam metodologias inovadoras. Desenvolver um plano de ensino interativo com recursos de indicação de conteúdos multimídia a serem usados por professores e alunos onde os diretores podem monitorar desenvolvimentos e feedbacks. Oferecemos planos personalizados.

Na Plansis, tive a oportunidade de trabalhar como Analista de Sistemas em diversos projetos de diferentes em empresas durante os  3 anos que estive na equipe. Desenvolvemos trabalhamos de grande impacto na Ipiranga no projeto KVM de Vantagens, nas Drogarias Araújo com seu projeto de intranet e na Engie com diversos portais de conteúdo e desenvolvimento de plataformas de integração.
Desenvolvendo sites usando o IBM Web Content Manager. Criação de modelos de autorias, modelos de apresentações, áreas do site, taxonomias, categorias, componentes e fluxos de trabalhos.

details.name: Cloud Migration (Azure → AWS) with Terraform — Zero Downtime
details.description: Led the migration of Coodesh’s infrastructure from Azure to AWS using Terraform, executing a phased cutover strategy to ensure zero downtime. Standardized environments as code, improved repeatability across deployments, and reduced operational risk through automated provisioning and controlled traffic switching.

details.name: AWS Cost Optimization
details.description: Reduced AWS spend by ~$5,000/month by migrating to a more cost-effective region, optimizing load balancers, tightening scalability controls, and introducing a scheduled dev environment (auto-on during business hours, auto-off outside working hours) to eliminate unnecessary consumption without impacting production reliability

details.name: Multi-language Content Linking at Scale (40K+ articles, 23 languages)
details.description: Connected 40,000+ articles across 23 languages by implementing an Elasticsearch-based discovery and linking system using tagging and similarity techniques, improving content relevance, navigation, and overall discoverability

details.name: Translation Cost Reduction via Automation + Human Review
details.description: Reduced translation costs by automating a machine-translation + human-review workflow, scaling publication and quality control across 23 languages (2017) while increasing speed and consistency.

manfredSpecificData.goodPractices:
I’m intentional about engineering practices that keep teams fast and reliable over time. I follow GitFlow (or a lightweight variant when appropriate) to keep work structured, protect release branches, and make changes traceable through well-scoped pull requests and reviews.

On the delivery side, I treat CI/CD as a core capability: automated builds, linting, test suites, and repeatable deployments. I rely on feature flags/toggles to ship incrementally, reduce risk, and decouple releases from product rollouts. I also prioritize observability (logs/metrics/alerts) and post-incident learnings to continuously improve stability.

From an infrastructure perspective, I apply FinOps principles to balance reliability and cost: right-sizing resources, removing waste, optimizing load balancers, setting scaling policies, and automating non-production environments (e.g., scheduling dev/staging to run only during business hours). My goal is to deliver scalable architectures that are both resilient and cost-efficient.
